files.description: Example documentation showing how the minimal GitHub Actions workflow runs the one-command runner and how to reproduce the same steps locally, including output verification expectations.

missionDescription: Add a minimal GitHub Actions workflow that (1) installs deps, (2) runs the one-command runner (gate → validator → meta-analysis demo), (3) uploads runtime/_build as an artifact, and (4) hard-fails if required output paths are missing.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Establishes continuous, automated TEVV-style evaluation by running the one-command runner in CI and surfacing runtime/_build as an auditable artifact, reducing regression risk and making “borderline Q...
